definitions.definition: An outside step leading up to the door of a building , usually a home .

examples: They want to build the prison right on our doorstep ; it will only be half a mile away and being that close scares me.

definitions.definition: A thick slice , especially of bread .

main_definition: An outside step leading up to the door of a building , usually a home .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) One's immediate neighbourhood or locality .
( UK , informal ) A thick slice , especially of bread .
